<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Bounces in his tile when a zombie gets close, dealing splash damage on each landing. Does not block zombies while airborne。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋スクワッシュ</color>

plants.name: 銀の破滅キノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>銀の破滅キノコ turned destruction into a money-making venture — and a lucrative one at that. Of course, he spent his first fortune immediately... on a fancy new skin。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A 破滅キノコ that swapped bang for bling.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Does not explode。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>破滅キノコ＋マリーゴールド</color>

plants.name: 金の破滅キノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Ahem, eyes over here." That's how 金の破滅キノコ begins every ウォールナッツ Street summit. The other tycoons fear him—not just for his wealth, but for his power to erase their wealth in one glorious blast。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Turns money into ruin.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Does not passively explode。</color>
<color=black>究極：</color><color=#8B0000>Costs 3000コイン, クールタイム：30秒; Releases a 破滅キノコ effect that does not leave a crater。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>強化コスト：</color><color=#8B0000>6000コイン</color>

plants.name: 鉄のスクワッシュ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>鉄のスクワッシュ armored up in cold steel, harder, heavier and packs more harm. Just don't mention the "rivets" on his face. He insists they're structural... not acne。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A metal-plated スクワッシュ with terrifying weight.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1000</color>

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>3240</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Metal plant. Can be fed corresponding metal objects to restore 500 Toughness. Receives half the damage from explosive cherries。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>Bucket/Screen Door＞スクワッシュ</color>

plants.name: 津波スプルースバリスタ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>津波スプルースバリスタ once served proudly atop the castle walls, convinced his power was like a roaring tsunami. Turns out, everyone was just talking about the screech his strings made when reloading. Embarrassed but undeterred, he found salvation in aloe juice. Now his bolts are smoother, deadlier, and most importantly, much quieter。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fires tidal bolts with a tsunami's force; targets struck become more vulnerable to chill.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/1秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> 雪玉と吹雪から凍結無効
<color=black>•</color> Fires 4 bolts in quick succesion before resting for 3s.
<color=black>•</color> 90% chance to fire Tidal Bolts. Applies Soaked for 5秒。A soaked zombie will be frozen instead of chilled when hit by a cryo-system attacks. The status is then cleared and cannot be reapplied for 10秒.
<color=black>•</color> 10% chance to fire Ice Bolts. 極冷却を付与。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>水滴アロエ＞スプルースバリスタ</color>

plants.name: ドローンナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Some claim zombies have mastered the martial arts to be able to harm plants with falling petals. Most plants dismiss it. But ドローンナッツ disagrees. "It’s true," he says, floating overhead. "I've blocked such blows. Three times."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A hovering nut that shields its tile from damage.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Absorbs damage for its own tile.
<color=black>•</color> If undamaged for 10秒, regenerates 50 HP per second。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋ブロバー</color>

plants.name: とげのあるナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>とげのあるナッツ proudly insists he's the true スパイクナッツ。 "Look at these spines! This color!" he declares constantly. One day, someone finally asked, "Wait… who's スパイクナッツ again?"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A とげのあるナッツ that punishes attackers and disables balloon zombies.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Reflects 50 damage back to zombies biting it.
<color=black>•</color> Can pop Balloons。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋サボテン</color>

plants.name: スターナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>スターナッツ lives under a rock and rarely moves. It's not because he's lazy, but because he's got standards. He'll only act if invited by a certain square friend to jellyfishing… or to prank a neighbor。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A reactive defender that counters with little stars.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Fires five 20-damage stars in all directions when damaged。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋スターフルーツ</color>

plants.name: 冬筍蓮
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Every winter, 冬筍蓮 tries to impress potential mates with a dazzling petal display. But his performance often goes… too fast. And too cold. The girls walk away before he even finishes blooming。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A self-healing barricade that grows stronger with nearby allies.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> 雪玉と吹雪から凍結無効
<color=black>•</color> Heals himself by 50 HP when charged.
<color=black>•</color> Recovers 40 HP every 1.5秒。This HP recovery is increased by 100% for each adjacent 冬筍バリケード-type plants.
<color=black>•</color> Resilience (defaults to 1): Incoming damage is divided by resilience. Max HP is treated as multiplied by resilience. Resilience is increased by 0.3 for each adjacent 冬筍バリケード-type plants。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>冬筍バリケード＋雪蓮</color>

plants.name: 冬筍アロエ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>冬筍アロエ loves to travel and promote his snowy hometown. But no one ever seems interested. "They always think the pack on my back is just a bump from getting whacked," he complains. "No wonder they think the tundra's an unforgiving place."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>An ice-hardened barricade that thrives against cold-based zombies.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> 雪玉と吹雪から凍結無効
<color=black>•</color> Gains ice charges like 水滴アロエ.
<color=black>•</color> Resilience (defaults to 1): Incoming damage is divided by resilience. Max HP is treated as multiplied by resilience. Consumes 1 charge to raise resilience by 2. Gains 1 resilience when fighting chilled/frozen zombies (not stackable with previous ability)。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>冬筍バリケード＋水滴アロエ</color>

plants.name: 冬筍射手
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The zombies thought they could avoid any road accidents by steering clear of 冬筍バリケードs. But ever since the 冬筍射手 arrived, sharpened shoots started flying their way. Scattering in panic, they fled while shouting, "Shoot! Shoots!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fires piercing bamboo shoots!

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1800</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>60/3s</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Immune to freeze from Snowballs and Blizzards.
<color=black>•</color> Shots pierce like スプルース射手's.
<color=black>•</color> When a shot hits a zombie: If HP is higher than the zombie's, deals damage equal to the HP difference to self and the zombie is instantly killed. If lower, HP is reduced to a minimum of 300, and the zombie takes damage equivalent to the difference. This ability does not activate if HP is 300 or lower.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スプルース射手＋冬筍バリケード</color>

plants.name: スイカナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Whenever zombies come to buy watermelons, the melon stand owner 水滴アロエ always sells them the biggest one—the スイカナッツ。 After the zombies crack their teeth on it, 水滴アロエ refers them to a nearby dental clinic to get them fixed, and, naturally, that clinic also belongs to 水滴アロエ.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Grows a temporary shield and retaliates with a melon after taking a certain amount of damage.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> When taking damage, stores 1.5× the damage taken as Retaliation Charge. If the damage exceeds 100/500/1000, stores 3/4.5/6× the damage instead.
<color=black>•</color> Retaliation Meter is capped at max HP.
<color=black>•</color> When the Retaliation Meter exceeds 1000, consumes all charges to launch a watermelon dealing the same amount of damage and gains a shield of equal value that fully decays over 5s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋スイカパルト</color>

plants.name: キャベツナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Every year, Cabbages can't wait to sprout, but キャベツナッツ is always the exception. He wraps himself up tightly before stepping out. "Zombies don't have the patience to peel layer after layer. Trust me."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Grows a temporary shield and retaliates with a cabbage after taking a certain amount of damage.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> When taking damage, stores 1× the damage taken as Retaliation Charge. If the damage exceeds 100/500/1000, stores 2/3/4× the damage instead.
<color=black>•</color> Retaliation Meter is capped at max HP.
<color=black>•</color> When the Retaliation Meter exceeds 1000, consumes all charges to launch a cabbage dealing the same amount of damage and gains a shield of equal value that fully decays over 5s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋キャベツパルト</color>

plants.name: バターナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"They're terrifying, just like in disaster movies." バターナッツ trembles as he hides his face behind butter. But the chance to observe zombies up close fills him with curiosity, and in the end, he can't help but peek out from behind the butter, studying these creatures frozen in the last frame of their lives.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Zombies are immobilized each time they bite - now that's what you call a "head-butter awakening."

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>噛まれた場合は、攻撃してきたゾンビをバターで2秒間動けなくします。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋カーネルパルト</color>

plants.name: 冬筍刃
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"We're supposed to be barriers, yet zombies always gnaw on us like we're snacks," 冬筍刃 laments. Determined, she sets out to master tougher parrying and counterattack skills. Whether she's succeeded is unclear, but she sure looks tastier than ever.</color>
plants.info:
冬筍バリケード that steadily generates a protective shield.<size=36>

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Generates 60 points of Shield every 1.5s, up to (max HP×1＋60) points.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>冬筍バリケード＋草刃</color>

plants.name: 冬筍小松炉草
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>As the tallest bodyguard from the 冬筍バリケード Security Company, 冬筍小松炉草 stays hidden yet alert. Across all his zombie encounters, he's never got injured—not even once. That's a pretty dazzling record.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>An upgraded 小松炉草 that absorbed 冬筍バリケード, with an expanded protection range.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Inherits the traits of 小松炉草 but with range expanded to 3×3. Reverts to regular 小松炉草 after 60s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>小松炉草＋冬筍バリケード</color>

plants.name: 要塞ナッツ
plants.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>プラントの中には、要塞ナッツがゾンビに何もしなかったことに不満を漏らす者もいた。「彼は本当に怠け者だ。庭から戦場まで歩くことすらできないだろう。屋根から転げ落ちたまま、動こうとしないのか？」要塞ナッツは何も答えるつもりはなかった。彼の意志は殻のように固く、ただ自分を必要とするプラントたちを守ることだけを考えていた。

-Ultra Badlanderー著</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>突破不可能な重防御要塞。フィールド上の防御プラントの種類が多いほど、自身の防御力が上昇します。

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>32000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> 背高植物。
<color=black>•</color> 圧殺耐性、被ダメージは最大HPの3分の1に制限される
<color=black>•</color> ダメージ上限後は、（1＋0.1×フィールド上の防御植物種の数）で割ってダメージを軽減します。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ ∞ トールナッツ ∞ ウォールナッツ＜ヒカマホウ（中央に設置して）</color>

plants.name: ヒプノピー
plants.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Simply making Zombies into our allies isn't enough. We need to equip them with a little extra firepower, and have them look more like us in the process!" ヒプノピー says in an alluring tone.

-Written by Mr. Etc.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Shoots ヒプノピーs that turn killed zombies into friendly ヒプノピー Zombies.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>30/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Summons a Hypnotized ヒプノピー Zombie upon killing a zombie.
<color=black>•</color> Abilities do not work in water lanes.
<color=black>•</color> ヒプノピー Zombie: 270 HP, fires a 20-damage ヒプノピー every 1.5s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ピーシューター＋ヒプノキノコ</color>

plants.name: ヒプノリピーター
plants.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>ヒプノリピーター talks fast and finishes most sentences before anyone else starts speaking. "Reality's a loop! I've fired this shot before, twice!"

-Written by Ocean Soul</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>リピーター that fires ヒプノピーs.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>30×2/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Summons a Hypnotized ヒプノピー Zombie upon kill.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>リピーター＋ヒプノキノコ</color>

plants.name: スプリットヒプノピー
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I feel dizzy!" "Actually it's not that bad." "No, I'm totally disoriented." "But your head's in the back." "That's just a figure of speech." "And I'm being literal." "These two brothers are arguing again," says ヒプノピー, "probably their 3682nd time."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>スプリットピー that fires ヒプノピー.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>30×3/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Summons a Hypnotized ヒプノピー Zombie upon kill.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スプリットピー＋ヒプノキノコ</color>

plants.name: ヒプノガトリングピー
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>ヒプノガトリングピー is a star in the Zombie Friends Club. "There's nothing wrong with my eyes. I know which zombies can be redeemed." He harshly criticizes the radical Hypno Squash: "He's too violent, we should be friendlier with our potential collaborators." Their debate is now so intense that only the two of them remain in the club, besides the one who started it all.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ガトリングピー that fires ヒプノピーs.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>30×4/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Summons a Hypnotized ヒプノピー Zombie upon kill.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ガトリングピー＋ヒプノキノコ</color>

plants.name: スリーピーター大将
plants.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>This trio in particular showed serious dedication at the Pea Squad Bootcamp, always firing in unison, and settling arguments with each other in record time. They earned the title of First スリーピーター Commando, and had the 3 stars split across each of their helmets.

-Written by Mr. Etc.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Fires copious amounts of peas in three lanes.

<color=#4A2900>利用条件：旅行モード</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>(20×6)×3/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>60×3/0.02s</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>6% chance to shoot a barrage of snow peas each attack, lasting 5s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スリーピーター＋ピー大将</color>

plants.name: 破滅狙撃ピー
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Ever heard plants whisper in the dead of night?" He wipes his old rifle. "She's slow, but she's never let me down…" A dark light cuts the air. "Time to beat my 48 out of 50 hit record."</color>
plants.info:
Piercing shots and rapid fire; charged shots deal massive area damage.<size=36>

<color=#4A2900>利用条件：旅行モード</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>100/0.3s</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> 無限貫通; +1 Doom & Frenzy charge per shot.
<color=black>•</color> Consumes 300 Doom charges to trigger a 破滅キノコ blast (72× base damage) at the location of the first zombie hit.
<color=black>•</color> Consumes 100 Frenzy charges for double the fire rate, lasting for 8s.
<color=black>•</color> 10% chance to crit for 6× damage (crit is guaranteed against zombies with the Ember debuff).</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>狙撃ピー＋破滅キノコ</color>

plants.name: 隠れキノコ
plants.introduce:
<align=justified><size=36><color=black>隠れキノコ cares for his friends. Even though he can fly away from the danger of zombies, into the clouds of high above, he can't simply abandon his roots. In an attempt to protect them, he covers them with his leaves and begs the zombies not to hurt them. And the zombies, for some reason, listen.

-Written by Ultra Badlander</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Floats above ground, providing camouflage to nearby ビクビクキノコs hiding from zombies.

スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Hovering plant.
<color=black>•</color> Zombies won't eat hiding Scaredy-type plants in a 3×3 area around the 隠れキノコ.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ビクビクキノコ＋ブロバー</color>

plants.name: ビク爆キノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>The meekest Cherry in the family, no tantrums, no shouting, and loved by many. "I… kinda want to swear sometimes," she admits. "But… I'm afraid someone might yell back."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Frightened easily, but causes an explosion when it happens.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>40/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>When scared, hides and sets off a チェリー爆弾 blast that deals 600 AoE damage.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ビクビクキノコ＋チェリー爆弾</color>

plants.name: 破滅ブロバー
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Nyan Squash just wanted a stronger fan… but not even nuclear power can seem to meet her requirements. "This is a terrible model," Zomboss noted. "All that heat and waste product? Blasted straight out."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Blasts zombies with high-temp wind laced with ash and nuclear fallout.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Lasts for 10s before disappearing.
<color=black>•</color> Every second, deals 180 Cremator damage to all zombies on the lawn. Damage is doubled against zombies with the Ember debuff.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ブロバー＋破滅キノコ</color>

plants.name: 冷風ブロバー
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>冷風ブロバー is a -4°C air conditioner. When his chilly breeze blows, it feels like stepping straight into winter. Even Snow Pea is frozen, the cold wind actually froze his own projectiles. What could possibly be colder than that? Answer: The atmosphere after Coldsnap Bean's told one of his totally tone deaf jokes.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ブロバー of a freezing breeze that constantly applies chill.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Lasts for 10s before disappearing.
<color=black>•</color> Every second, deals 1 damage and applies 20 Cryo points to all zombies on the lawn.
<color=black>•</color> Converts all snow peas on screen to polar ice peas.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ブロバー＋氷キノコ</color>

plants.name: 破滅スターフルーツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I could destroy almost the entire planet if I wanted to," boasts 破滅スターフルーツ, "and they'd all blame it on the biggest star in the sky..."</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Transforms himself into a 破滅メテオ and crash into the ground.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Disappears after 3s and summons a 破滅メテオ that deals 1800 area damage on impact and splits into 180 spore stars each dealing 20 damage.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スターフルーツ＋破滅キノコ</color>

plants.name: ニンニクナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>ニンニクナッツ believes even zombies deserve a balanced diet. He'll always stand between them and your brains, gently nudging them toward healthier options like キャベツナッツ。</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A tough nut with ニンニク properties, poisonous and hits instantly.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>When bitten, poisons attacker for 10s and gives them 1 Poison point.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋ニンニク</color>

plants.name: 磁ナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Everyone knows magnets attract metal, but 磁ナッツ? People wonder why he's no longer doing that. 磁ナッツ himself claims to prefer the security of a orbiting shield of projectiles over pulling nails and screws.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Pulls friendly straight-shooting projectiles nearby and makes them orbit him.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Attracts nearby plant straight-shooting projectiles, making them orbit at a radius of 1.5 Tiles; can hold up to 100 projectiles at once, each lasting up to 20s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋磁石キノコ</color>

plants.name: ミニスイカパルト
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>ミニスイカパルトs love to share, even with zombies. They chop their melons into small slices and toss them over. Strangely, zombies are terrible at catching them…</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Melon slices lose the ability to do splash but are now twice effective against shrunken zombies.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>80/3s</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles).
<color=black>•</color> Melon slices no longer do splash damage but deal double the damage to shrunken zombies.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スイカパルト＞パフキノコ</color>

plants.name: 芽キャベツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>People say 芽キャベツ holds the magical power to shrink zombies. And the secret, they claim, is in the bounce. But only ポップコーンパルト knows the real reason: there's a tiny pat of butter hidden inside. The cabbage leaves are just too thick for it to pop out… so of course it needs to bounce first to shrink a zombie.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Lobs sprouts capable of passing on the shrinking effect.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>1500</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles).
<color=black>•</color>Shots bounce twice. If a shot hits a shrunken zombie, it gains the ability to shrink the next zombies hit.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>キャベツパルト＞パフキノコ</color>

plants.name: ナッツの炎木
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Today's menu features roasted nuts." Even ナッツの炎木 can't help but smile at the thought of having made such a treat. It's the perfect picnic snack, except that no actual ウォールナッツ are around. The "roasted nuts" are bread replicas, so realistic that they make real ウォールナッツ uneasy.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Capable of producing Roasted ウォールナッツ。

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>For every 50 peas lit, a Roasted ウォールナッツ is spawned in front.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋炎木</color>

plants.name: 熱いウォールナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Light, grant me warmth, grant me strength." Roasted ウォールナッツ smiles, radiating a delicate glow… and the scent of cumin. Fresh from a barbecue party, his crispy shell draws hungry eyes from everyone, zombies included.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A ウォールナッツ formed in intense temperatures, but not much different.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Cannot be used for fusions.
<color=black>•</color> Can be converted to a regular ウォールナッツ using an 氷の鉢.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 銀のナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I'm a valuable item," says 銀のナッツ, "Handle me with care." After quitting his job at the bowling alley, he thought about starting the "Nonferrous Metal Protection Association," but nothing came of it, as he'd spent all his money keeping his silver paint in perfect condition.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>ウォールナッツ made of silver, with higher toughness.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>6000</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ウォールナッツ＋マリーゴールド</color>

plants.name: 金のナッツ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Zombies just can't resist biting into 金のナッツ's shell to see what's inside. It's not magic; there's simply a rumor among zombies that he's a chocolate truffle wrapped in gold foil.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36> ウォールナッツ made of gold, with even higher toughness; can use Ultimate to boost max HP and restore health.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>8000</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>Costs 1000 Coins, Cooldown: 5s; Increases max Toughness by 1000 and restores health equal to its full Toughness</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>強化コスト：</color><color=#8B0000>1000 Coins, 1 instance of Ultimate included</color>

plants.name: ヒプノスイカ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>ヒプノスイカ loves making friends, painting, and mixing drinks. She's the star bartender at a bar, and her iced ヒプノスイカ juice is even more popular than classic cocktails. Some of her more eccentric fans have even dressed up as zombies just to get a taste.</color>
plants.info:
Lobs ヒプノスイカ capable of hypnotizing hordes of zombies.<size=36>

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>120/3s</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Both direct hits and splash damage have a 25% chance to hypnotize zombies with less than 50% max HP.
<color=black>•</color> When bitten, hypnotizes the attacker, then reverts to a スイカパルト。</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>スイカパルト＋ヒプノキノコ</color>

plants.name: 氷の鉢
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>Summer is when 氷の鉢 is most active. "Heehee, feeling hot? Want to come cool off here?" he says. "Just be careful not to slip on the ice. And if you're a watermelon seeking shade, watch out! Once you turn into a chilled watermelon, someone might just eat you!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can materialize plants forged in fire.

<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>Every 10s, transforms a specific Roasted plant on its tile into its base form usable for fusion.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>氷キノコ＞植木鉢</color>

plants.name: パンプキン火鉢
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>パンプキン火鉢 dislikes loud, showy gestures. He's calm, reserved, and quietly helps any peas in need. Even at a barbecue, if he's served half-raw food, he won't complain; he'll just tuck it inside himself and take it home. It'll be perfectly cooked by then anyways.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Can ignite peas and produce 熱いパンプキンs.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>For every 50 peas lit, a 熱いパンプキン is spawned in front.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>炎木＞パンプキン</color>

plants.name: 熱いパンプキン
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"Happy Halloween!" calls 熱いパンプキン, handing out bags of candy to mischievous little plants. And when the candy's gone, don't forget to come see his stage play—he might just play the Headless Horseman himself!</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A Pumpkin formed in intense temperatures, but not much different.

<color=black>耐久力：</color><color=#8B0000>4000</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>>
<color=black>•</color> Cannot be used for fusions.
<color=black>•</color> Can be converted to a regular Pumpkin using an 氷の鉢.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>

plants.name: 狙撃キノコ部隊
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>As the 狙撃キノコ部隊 says: "In the great tides of history, what's long divided must unite, and what's long united must divide… you included." In downtime, he loves reading Romance of the Three Kingdoms. "The past is just old tales. Right now I'm the sharpest shot there is!"</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Splits for pinpoint snipes, merges for explosive crowd control.

<color=#4A2900>利用条件：旅行モード</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>500×3/3s (Split), 1500/0.5s (Merged)</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Short plant (evades straight-firing projectiles).
<color=black>•</color> In split mode, every 6th shot is a headshot dealing 1M damage.
<color=black>•</color> After 15 shots, merges for 15s before splitting again.
<color=black>•</color> In merged mode, attacks do AoE splash damage in a 1-tile radius.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>狙撃ピー＞パフキノコ×3</color>

plants.name: 鮫キノコ
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>"I come from the vast ocean,"  鮫キノコ boasts. "With this shark mimicry, I can scare off any predator. It's an evolution only possible in the deep sea." He loves telling tales of his past to 海キノコs, but never reveals why he left the ocean: the disguise often attracts real sharks.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>A cannibalistic フュームキノコ that "feeds" on 海キノコs, borrowing the menace of Leviathan-shroom to drive away enemies.

<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>20/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>
<color=black>•</color> Using a 海キノコ seedpacket on him extends his range to the full lane for 10s.
<color=black>•</color> Knocks back zombies knocked back by Leviathan-shroom within the last 3s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>フュームキノコ＞海キノコ</color>

plants.name: 幻嵐大将
plants.introduce: <align=justified><size=36><color=black>幻嵐大将 is hopelessly smitten with zombies. She painstakingly paints every pea pink and admires the bright flash when they ignite. "It's a gift for the zombies," she says, eager to send as many as possible.</color>
plants.info:
<size=36>Constantly fires loads of ヒプノピーs.

<color=#4A2900>利用条件：旅行モード</color>
<color=black>ダメージ：</color><color=#8B0000>30×6/1.5秒</color>
<color=black>Ultimate: </color><color=#8B0000>30×3/0.02s</color>
<color=black>スペシャル：</color><color=#8B0000>2% chance to shoot a barrage of ヒプノピー each attack, lasting 5s.</color>
plants.cost: <size=36>融合レシピ：<color=#8B0000>ピー大将＋ヒプノキノコ</color>
